quote: Don ko pakadna mushkil hi nahin, namumkin hai.
Kabhi kabhi kuch jeetne ke liye kuch haarna bhi padta hai, aur haar kar jeetne wale ko baazigar kehte hain.
Aaj ek hasi aur baant lo, aaj ek dua aur maang lo, aaj ek ansoo aur pee lo, aaj ek zindagi aur jee lo, aaj ek sapna aur dekh lo, aaj... kya pata, kal ho na ho!
Aaj mere paas gaadi hai, bungla hai, paisa hai... tumhare paas kya hai?
Yeh tumhare baap ka ghar nahin, police station hai. Aur yeh police waale hai bhi kutte ke pille.
Don ko 11 mulkon ki police dhoondh rahi hai, lekin ek baat samajh mein nahi aati ki Don ko pakadna mushkil hi nahin, namumkin hai.
Rishte mein toh hum tumhare baap lagte hain, naam hai Shahenshah.
Picture abhi baaki hai, mere dost.
Hum ek baar jeete hain, ek baar marte hain, shaadi bhi ?? baar hoti hai, aur pyar... ek hi baar hota hai.
